text:
OptioSurgical (wwwo.optiosurgical.com) | Full-time | Denver, CO

OptioSurgical is a software startup in Denver Colorado focused on reducing healthcare costs through analytics and surgical implant price transparency.

We have several positions open including UX design, QA automation and full stack software engineers.

Unlimited PTO, Flex hours, and an awesome team!

Check us out: https://optiosurgical.com/about-us/
